content.en: Reservoir characterization: Scientists have been using algorithms to improve the understanding of petroleum reservoirs. These algorithms are being used to predict lithology, estimate porosity, infer rock facies, and characterize reservoir uncertainty. By combining seismic data, well logs, and rock physics, these algorithms are helping to provide high-resolution reservoir characterization and improve the estimation of reservoir parameters.
content.da: Reservoirkarakterisering: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at forbedre forståelsen af petroleumsreserver. Disse algoritmer bruges til at forudsige litologi, estimere porøsitet, udlede klippefacies og karakterisere reservoirusikkerhed. Ved at kombinere seismiske data, borelogs og klippefysik hjælper disse algoritmer med at levere højopløselig reservoirkarakterisering og forbedre estimeringen af reservoarparametre.
